{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=Archer C3150 |revision=v1.x |series=AC3150 |asin=B01AK9TC0Y |newegg=0E6-002W-000W7 |fcc_date=11/20/2015 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=TE7C3150 |ic_id=8853A-C3150 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4709C0;BCM4709C0KFEBG; |cpu1_cspeed=1.4 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34ML01G200TFI00 |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ2G63FFR-PBC |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4366;BCM4366KMMLG; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4366;BCM4366KMMLG; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz RF Power Amplifier;Skyworks;SE2623L;;4; ,,, 2.4GHz SPDT switch w/ LNA;Skyworks;SKY85201-11;;4; ,,, 5GHz RF Power Amplifier;RFMD;RFPA5542;;4; ,,, 5GHz SPDT switch w/ LNA;Skyworks;SKY85605-11;;4; |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, Link Aggregation, 1024QAM, NitroQAM, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }}
:• '''2167''' Mbps - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan., 1024-QAM), :• '''1000''' Mbps - 4SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 1024-QAM) = '''''3150 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC3150 Wireless MU-MIMO Gigabit Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/Archer-C3150.html}}{{SupportPage|vendor=TP-LINK|model=Archer-C3150_V2}} "2050500664" and "1548" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. *[[TP-LINK Archer C3150]] - ''AC3150 Wireless MU-MIMO Gigabit Router'' :• FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7C3150 TE7C3150] (11/20/2015) :2167Mbps (5GHz) / 1000Mbps (2.4GHz), 4x4 [[Broadcom NitroQAM]] (1024-QAM) :[[Broadcom]] @1.4GHz Dual Core CPU, Wi-Fi Co-Processors in each radio *[[TP-LINK Archer C3150 v2.x]] - ''AC3150 Wireless MU-MIMO Gigabit Router'' :• FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7C3150V2 TE7C3150V2] (02/17/2017) - [https://fccid.io/TE7C3150V2/Internal-Photos/Internal-Photo-3286002.html FCC images] :Flash: ''Winbond'' W25Q256FGFV (32MB) ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33006-tp-link-ac3150-wireless-mu-mimo-gigabit-router-reviewed ''TP-LINK AC3150 Wireless MU-MIMO Gigabit Router'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[http://www.anandtech.com/show/8862/quantenna-maintains-80211ac-technology-lead-as-broadcom-and-marvell-launch-new-chipsets PR on '''Anandtech'''] ===See also=== *[[TP-LINK Archer C5400 v1.x]] - ''AC5400 Tri-Band WiFi Gigabit Router'' :• FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7C5400 TE7C5400] ''AC5300 Tri-Band Wi-Fi Gigabit Router'' • [http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/cat-9_Archer-C5400.html PPage] :2x 2167Mbps (5GHz) / 1000Mbps (2.4GHz), 4x4 [[Broadcom]] 1024-QAM :[[Broadcom]] @1.4GHz dual core CPU, Wi-Fi co-processors in each radio *[[TP-LINK Archer C3200]] - ''AC3200 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router'' :• FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7C3200 TE7C3200] 2x 1300Mbps (5GHz) / 600Mbps (2.4GHz), [[Broadcom]] *[[TP-LINK Archer C2600 v1.x]] - ''AC2600 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router'' :• FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7C2600 TE7C2600], 1733Mbps (5GHz) / 800Mbps (2.4GHz), 4x4 AC [[QCA]] __NOTOC__
